price: Ó sọ pé: “Dájúdájú mo máa lọ sí (ìlú tí) Olúwa mi (pa mí láṣẹ láti lọ). Ó sì máa tọ́ mi sọ́nà (láti dé ibẹ̀).¹
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
